      • isStopword

        public static boolean isStopword​(java.lang.String word)
        check if a word is a stop word
        Parameters:
        word - the word to check
        Returns:
        true if the word is shorter than 2 chars, or if it's a number, or if it is included in the stop-word list

      • isStemmedStopword

        public static boolean isStemmedStopword​(java.lang.String word)
        check if a word is a stop word
        Parameters:
        word - the word to check
        Returns:
        true if the word is shorter than 2 chars, or if it's a number, or: if it is included in the stemmed-stop-word list, or if it's stemmed version is in the regular or stemmed lists.
